title: React for Beginners
description: Learn React from scratch and build interactive web applications step by step.
details: This course covers the fundamentals of React including components, state management, hooks, and API integration. By the end, you’ll have the skills to create full dynamic front-end projects.
whatYouWillLearn: Understand the basics of React components and JSX
Manage state effectively using React Hooks
requirements: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
A computer with an internet connection

instructorInfo.name: John Doe
instructorInfo.bio: Full-stack developer with over 10 years of experience teaching web technologies.

reviews.name: Ahmed Khaled
reviews.comment: Amazing course! The instructor explains everything clearly.

reviews.name: Sara Nasser
reviews.comment: Very good introduction to React. I built my first app!

faq.question: Do I need prior coding experience?
faq.answer: No, this course starts from the basics and explains everything clearly.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, a completion certificate is provided after finishing the course.

title: Mastering JavaScript
description: Deep dive into modern JavaScript ES6+ features, async programming, and DOM manipulation.
details: You’ll build real-world applications, learn debugging techniques, and understand how JavaScript powers modern web frameworks like React and Vue.
whatYouWillLearn: Work with APIs and JSON data

instructorInfo.name: Jane Smith
instructorInfo.bio: Senior JavaScript engineer passionate about teaching and simplifying coding concepts.

reviews.name: Mohamed Ali
reviews.comment: One of the best JS courses I've ever taken!

faq.question: Is this course up-to-date?
faq.answer: Yes, it includes ES2023 features and best practices.

faq.question: Do I need prior JavaScript experience?
faq.answer: Some basics help, but the course reviews all key concepts.

title: UI/UX Design Basics
description: Discover the core principles of design thinking and user experience design.
details: This course covers color theory, typography, layout principles, and usability testing. Great for aspiring designers and developers.
whatYouWillLearn: Understand user flow and information architecture

instructorInfo.name: Sarah Lee
instructorInfo.bio: UI/UX designer with 8+ years of experience creating digital products for global brands.

reviews.name: Omar Nasser
reviews.comment: Helped me start my design career!

faq.question: Do I need design software?
faq.answer: We’ll use free online tools like Figma and Canva.

faq.question: Is there a final project?
faq.answer: Yes, you’ll design a complete mobile app prototype.

title: Fullstack Development
description: Master both frontend and backend web development.
details: You’ll learn to build complete web apps with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Understand authentication, APIs, and deployment.
whatYouWillLearn: Build fullstack apps with React and Node.js
Deploy web apps to cloud platforms
requirements: Basic understanding of React or backend development

instructorInfo.name: Maria Lopez
instructorInfo.bio: Software engineer and instructor with a focus on modern web development stacks.

faq.question: Do I need to know backend?
faq.answer: Some basics help, but everything is explained.

faq.question: Is this a project-based course?
faq.answer: Yes, you’ll build multiple full projects.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn how to use Python for data analysis and visualization.
details: This course introduces NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib, and data cleaning techniques for real-world projects.
whatYouWillLearn: Use Python libraries for data analysis
Work with CSV, Excel, and API data

instructorInfo.name: David Wilson
instructorInfo.bio: Data scientist with 7+ years of experience in analytics and visualization.

faq.question: Is Python required?
faq.answer: Yes, basic Python helps but the course reviews it briefly.

title: Digital Marketing
description: Discover the world of online marketing, SEO, and ads.
details: This course covers social media marketing, Google Ads, and basic SEO strategies to grow businesses online.

instructorInfo.name: Emma Brown
instructorInfo.bio: Marketing strategist with 10+ years of experience in digital growth and branding.

faq.question: Is it really free?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a completely free course.

faq.question: Do I need any tools?
faq.answer: Just a laptop and internet connection.

title: Advanced CSS Animations
description: Bring your websites to life using professional CSS animation techniques and transitions.
details: Learn how to create smooth animations, micro-interactions, and dynamic UI effects with CSS and keyframes. Perfect for front-end developers.
whatYouWillLearn: Use CSS transitions and keyframes effectively
Build smooth hover and scroll animations
Enhance user interfaces with motion design
requirements: Good understanding of HTML and CSS

instructorInfo.name: Lucas Green
instructorInfo.bio: Front-end developer specialized in motion design and interactive web experiences.

reviews.name: Ola Hassan
reviews.comment: The animations are stunning and easy to follow!

reviews.name: Tamer Adel
reviews.comment: Learned so many new CSS tricks.

faq.question: Do I need JavaScript?
faq.answer: No, all animations are pure CSS-based.

faq.question: Can I use this with React?
faq.answer: Yes, all examples can be applied to React components.

title: Intro to Cybersecurity
description: Understand the basics of cybersecurity, online safety, and ethical hacking principles.
details: This course teaches how cyber attacks work, how to protect personal data, and introduces network security fundamentals.
requirements: Interest in technology and online safety

instructorInfo.name: Michael Carter
instructorInfo.bio: Certified cybersecurity analyst with a passion for educating beginners on online safety.

faq.question: Do I need technical experience?
faq.answer: No, this course starts from zero knowledge.

faq.question: Is there a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes, a free certificate is provided upon completion.
